item.title: PYXUS INTERNATIONAL INC 10-K
item.description: PYXUS INTERNATIONAL INC, which is in the Wholesale-Farm Product Raw Materials [5150] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 14, 2022 had 42568 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
